name: Luna (itch) (Phamility)
description:
Luna is just my attempt at AI and is meant to be a companion to chat with!

It's 100% scuffed and in the works, so if you want, you can comment your conversations or suggestions!

Credits to the artist: https://www.instagram.com/__yubibi/ ! Literally could not have done this without her :P

This game has been updated 4 times!
